name: [TRIP] 0.1.04
description:
New in 0.1.04:

- Added second puzzle of Level 2 (Gray box)

- Added golem controls and corresponding UI (character control swap tip, combine characters tip)

- Added transition between first and second puzzle of Level 2

- Added camera transitions (puzzle 1 -> transition <-> puzzle 2)

- Fixed Level 1 post-processing (was disabled in 0.1.03)
